chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
max_index_sanity_interface

Premises:
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
max_index_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net where ?orig_base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface si : sorted_interface lmi : log_matching_interface smspi : state_machine_safety'interface rlmli : refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface pllsi : prevLog_leader_sublog_interface ctgt0 : current_term_gt_zero_interface lalcii : lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface miaei : match_index_all_entries_interface lhlli : leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface lci : leader_completeness_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface taifoli : terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface glci : ghost_log_correct_interface lphogli : log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface glemi : ghost_log_entries_match_interface tci : transitive_commit_interface tsi : term_sanity_interface lhllsi : leaders_have_leaderLogs_str...

Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface

msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => P step_async_init : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (network -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
write_ghost_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (st : data) => log (snd st) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> data -> ghost_log Arguments write_ghost_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
terms_and_indices_from_one_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, terms_and_indices_from_one (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

entries_contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, contiguous_range_exact_lo (log (snd (nwState net h))) 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
